nodes.text: The rabbit was a small furry mammal with long ears that was used in magic shows, particularly by the illusionist Wim Magwit. Other entertainers were known to draw rabbits out of hats or stormtrooper helmets. There were rabbits on Endor. Rabbits were said to have good eyesight due to eating space carrots.
Rabbits shared many physical and physiological similarities with Chickatili and Durni. A subspecies of rabbit included the tumble bunny, a three-eared offshoot native to the forest moon of Endor.
Sentient lagomorphs (rabbit-like species) included the Bunny, Gerb, Hoojib, Kushiban, and Lepi.
